LanguageData.RedRattler.label: red rattler
LanguageData.RedRattler.description: A small predatory snake. Red rattlers can be highly aggressive if provoked, and their bite injects toxic venom into the victim.
LanguageData.RedRattler.tools.venomfangs.label: venom-fangs
LanguageData.RedRattler.tools.head.label: head
